TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit STAThreadAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class STAThreadAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class STAThreadAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指示應用程式的 COM 執行緒模型為單一執行緒 Apartment (Single-Threaded Apartment，STA)。

span.span: Indicates that the COM threading model for an application is single-threaded apartment (STA).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將此屬性套用至進入點方法 ( `Main()` C# 和 Visual Basic 中的方法)。Apply this attribute to the entry point method (the `Main()` method in C# and Visual Basic). 其不會影響其他方法。It has no effect on other methods. 若要設定您在您的程式碼中啟動的執行緒的 apartment 狀態，請使用或方法，然後再啟動執行緒。To set the apartment state of threads you start in your code, use the or method before starting the thread. > [!NOTE] > 如需 COM 執行緒模型的概觀，請參閱 < [ 了解與使用 COM 執行緒模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms809971.aspx)。For an overview of COM threading models, see [Understanding and Using COM Threading Models](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms809971.aspx). 使用 COM interop 的應用程式只適用於 COM 執行緒模型。COM threading models only apply to applications that use COM interop. COM 執行緒模型可以設定為單一執行緒 apartment 」 或 「 多執行緒的 apartment 中。The COM threading model can be set to single-threaded apartment or multithreaded apartment. 應用程式執行緒只會初始化 COM interop，如果執行緒實際上會呼叫 COM 元件。The application thread is only initialized for COM interop if the thread actually makes a call to a COM component. 如果未使用 COM interop，則未初始化的執行緒，而屬性，如果存在的話，沒有任何作用。If COM interop is not used, then the thread is not initialized, and the attribute, if it is present, has no effect. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，預設的執行緒 COM interop 的模型，取決於您開發您的應用程式，為下表顯示的語言。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, the default threading model for COM interop depends on the language in which you are developing your application, as the following table shows. |語言Language|COM apartment 模型COM apartment model| |--------------|-------------------------| |C#C#|多執行緒的 apartmentMultithreaded apartment| |C++C++|多執行緒的 apartmentMultithreaded apartment| |Visual BasicVisual Basic|單一執行緒 apartmentSingle-threaded apartment| 若要變更這些預設值，您使用屬性，設定應用程式或呼叫的執行緒模型或方法，然後再啟動執行緒以設定在特定執行緒的執行緒模型。To change these defaults, you use the attribute to set the threading model for the application, or call the or method before starting the thread to set the threading model for a particular thread. 在 c + +，您也可以使用[/CLRTHREADATTRIBUTE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4907e9ef-5031-446c-aecf-0a0b32fae1e8)連結器選項可指定 apartment 模型。In C++, you can also use the [/CLRTHREADATTRIBUTE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4907e9ef-5031-446c-aecf-0a0b32fae1e8) linker option to specify the apartment model. 設定 ASP.NET 應用程式應該`ASPCompat`的屬性[@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4)指示詞加入`true`強制 STA 執行緒集區，可服務頁面。ASP.NET applications should set the `ASPCompat` attribute of the [@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4) directive to `true` to force the page to be serviced by the STA thread pool. 以下是一些情況下，您會想要使用屬性來明確設定為單一執行緒 apartment 的 執行緒模型：Here are some of the cases in which you’ll want to use the attribute to explicitly set the threading model to single-threaded apartment: - 您正在開發的 Windows Forms 應用程式。You're developing a Windows Forms app. Windows Forms 應用程式必須是單一執行緒如果它們與通訊，Windows 系統元件，例如剪貼簿] 或 [Windows 通用對話方塊，或如果他們使用系統功能，例如拖放功能。Windows Forms apps must be single-threaded if they communicate with Windows system components such as the Clipboard or Windows common dialog boxes, or if they use system features such as drag-and-drop functionality. 適用於 C# Windows Forms 應用程式範本會自動加入C# 專案屬性。The Windows Forms Application template for C# automatically adds the attribute to C# projects. 單一執行緒 apartment 模型是 Visual Basic 的預設值，因為沒有必要的屬性。Because the single-threaded apartment model is the default for Visual Basic, there is no need for the attribute. - 您正在開發的 Visual Basic 程式庫，這會依賴 COM interop，反而會呼叫的 C# 應用程式。You're developing a C# app that calls a Visual Basic library, which, in turn, relies on COM interop. 因為單一執行緒 apartment 模型的預設值為 Visual Basic，您應該變更您的應用程式的執行緒模型為單一執行緒使用屬性。Because the single-threaded apartment model is the default for Visual Basic, you should change your app's threading model to single-threaded by using the attribute. - 您的應用程式會使用單一執行緒 apartment 模型的 COM 元件的呼叫。Your application makes calls to COM components that use the single-threaded apartment model.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
